content.text: Match ends, Córdoba 1, Almería 2.
Second Half ends, Córdoba 1, Almería 2.
Abel Gómez (Córdoba) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Javier Espinosa (Almería).
Substitution, Almería. Thomas Partey replaces Thievy.
Attempt blocked. Edimar (Córdoba) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Aleksandar Pantic.
Ángel Trujillo (Almería) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.

Foul by Aleksandar Pantic (Córdoba).
